lyrics.stanza: To realize and participate In the deep and hidden things God has ordained and prepared for us Requires us not only to believe in Him But also to love Him. To fear God, to worship God, And to believe in God, That is, to receive God, Are all inadequate; To love Him is the indispensable requirement. To love Him is the indispensable requirement.
